exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w" on hypothesis of type "hook_complete W1".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
W2: PCM.sort (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))
W1: PCM.sort (prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type))
s: state

Goal:
s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1

Premises:
prodPCM = fun U V : pcm => PCM.Pack (prodPCMMixin U V) : pcm -> pcm -> pcm
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
hook_domain = [ordType of nat * Label * (Label * nat)] : ordType
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
projectS = fun W : world => [eta um_filter (dom_filt W)] : world -> state -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
Notation PCM T m := (PCM T m)
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] ->...-> ?T'] ?x : [W1 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) s : state |- ?T'] ?s : [W1 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) s : state |- seq ?T]
Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
cohH : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w
a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
Actions.a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
Coh0 : forall (w : world) (s : state), w = Unit -> s = Unit -> Coh w s
Actions.tryrecv_act_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> Coh W s
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
unit_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> w = Unit < -> s = Unit
Actions.send_act_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s -> Coh W s
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
Actions.can_send = fun (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s : state) => (l \in dom s) && (this \in nodes p (getStatelet s l)) : protocol -> nid -> Label -> state -> bool
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (getStatelet s l)
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
PCM.sort = fun t : pcm => let (sort, _) := t in sort : pcm -> Type PCM.sort is a coercion

```coq
intros s Hs.
apply cohH in Hs.
rewrite <- (proj2 (cohW _ _) Hs).
assert (proj1 (Coh_dom _ _ _) (proj2 (coh_s _ _ _) Hs)).
assert (exists s1 s2, s = s1 \+ s2 /\ Coh W1 s1 /\ Coh W2 s2).
apply (proj2 (cohE _ _ _) Hs).
destruct H as [s1 [s2 [Hs1 [Hs2 Hs3]]]].
apply (proj1 (CohUn _ _ _) Hs2 Hs3).
apply (proj1 (cohW _ _) Hs).
Qed.```

original: intros s Hs. apply cohH in Hs. rewrite <- (proj2 (cohW _ _) Hs). assert (proj1 (Coh_dom _ _ _) (proj2 (coh_s _ _ _) Hs)). assert (exists s1 s2, s = s1 \+ s2 /\ Coh W1 s1 /\ Coh W2 s2). apply (proj2 (cohE _ _ _) Hs). destruct H as [s1 [s2 [Hs1 [Hs2 Hs3]]]]. apply (proj1 (CohUn _ _ _) Hs2 Hs3). apply (proj1 (cohW _ _) Hs).
